version_description: 修复了当旅行到不同的时区时应用在图标徽章上显示不正确号码的错误。
修复了当旅行到不同的时区时应用在图标徽章上显示不正确号码的错误。
修正了一些小错误。
修正了一些小错误。
清单项目将包括提醒时间（是否将清单项目按天分组）。比如，看牙医@下午1点。轻击“分类”按钮可改变分组情况。如有任何疑问，请与我们联系support@lumenspark.com。我们会在24小时之内回复您。

Minor bug fixes. Feel free to contact us at support@lumenspark.com if you have any questions. You'll hear from us within 24 hrs.

Fixed AirDrop data transfers on the iPad. Sorry about that. Feel free to contact us at support@lumenspark.com if you have any questions. You'll hear from us within 24 hrs.

We've updated Lumen Trails to run flawlessly on the brand new iOS 11, iPhone X, and iPad Pro (with split screen support). Email us if you need anything!

We've updated Lumen Trails to run on new iOS 11, iPhone X and iPad Pro (with split screen support).

Now Lumen Trails supports 13 most popular languages, spoken natively by over 3 billion people. In addition to English, we've translated it to Chinese (Simplified and Traditional), French, German, Hindi, Italian, Japanese, Korean, Polish, Portuguese (Brazil), Russian and Spanish (Mexico).

We've also made many small improvements based on your feedback, including ability to change the app icon (in Settings > Application Themes), motivational messages (tap the title on the main screen), streaks (for yes/no categories), 6-digit passcodes, haptic feedback (so that you can feel your interactions with the app), and more.

We hope that you enjoy this update.
- Lumen Spark Team
Celebrating 10 years of Lumen Trails. Updated the app to run flawlessly on the new (and gorgeous) iPhone XS, XS Max and iOS 12. Stay organized!

Added support for Dark Mode on iOS 13. Now you can schedule times of day when you'd like the app to automatically switch between Light and Dark Modes (to avoid straining your eyes). Go to iPhone Settings > Display & Brightness to enable Dark Mode.
